TestCase.name: testDistributeBy
TestCase.Resource: HiveDistribution(collation=[[]], dist=[[0, 2]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, d]]) +- Calc(select=[a, c, d]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testDistributeByWithCalc
TestCase.Resource: HiveDistribution(collation=[[]], dist=[[0]]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[+($0, 1)], b=[-($1, 1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($3, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- Calc(select=[-(b, 1) AS b, +(a, 1) AS a, c], where=[>(d, 0)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testWithTimeAttribute
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+($0, 1)], c=[$2], b=[$1], d=[$3]) +- HiveDistribution(collation=[[]], dist=[[2, 0]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$1], b=[$2], c=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$0], a=[$2], b=[$3], d=[$4]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], a=[SUM($2)], b=[SUM($3)], d=[AVG($4)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], $f1=[$TUMBLE($4, 120000:INTERVAL MINUTE)], a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, TableWithProc, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, proc)]]])

Calc(select=[+(a, 1) AS EXPR$0, c, b, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c, a]]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c, d]) +- GroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[c], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w$, proc, 120000)], select=[c, SUM(a) AS a, SUM(b) AS b, AVG(d) AS d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, TableWithProc, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, proc)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d, proc])
